Business justification: The headquarter was moved from Rua Augusto Ferreira de Morais, 818 - Sao Paulo to Av Luigi Papaiz, 239 - Diadema, the old site code was BRSPA. We have the Udinese (BRDIA) under the same address, but it's a different building.

We already have a new site code BRDIB, but isn't linked to any company. We need to link BRDIA to Shared Service Brazil.

We need to request a AVPN and ANIRA to  BRDIB site, but the "Shared Service Brazil - BRDIB" isn't on the "ASSA ABLOY Site" list: https://assaabloy.service-now.com/sp?id=sc_cat_item_guide&sys_id=7904f860dbe55890dbb3e1aa4b96197e&sysparm_category=1f866cfadb9858d0dbb3e1aa4b9619f4

Do not need "New Network Site Code", the site code for this Office is BRDIB, only need to link BRDIB to "Shared Service Brazil"
